mapper.sql: bookId, bookName, bookAuthor, bookPrice, bookTypeId, bookDesc, isBorrow, bookImage, bookCount, inventory
mapper.select: select from book_info order by bookId desc
mapper.insert: insert into book_info (bookName, bookAuthor, bookPrice, bookTypeId, bookDesc, isBorrow, bookImage, bookCount, inventory) values (#{bookname}, #{bookauthor}, #{bookprice}, #{booktypeid}, #{bookdesc}, #{isborrowed}, #{bookimg}, #{bookcount}, #{inventory})
mapper.select: select , (select bookTypeName from book_type where book_type.bookTypeId = book_info.bookTypeId) as bookTypeName from book_info order by bookId desc limit #{begin}, #{size}
